title: 3rd Age Druidic robes

properties.name: description
properties.value: 3rd age druidic robes are a set of 3rd age equipment. The robes require level 65 Prayer to wear. Players can obtain 3rd age druid robes equipment through master Treasure Trails; they cannot be bought in stores nor made through the Crafting skill.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Third-age prayer set
"Druidic robes" redirects here. For robes dropped by druids, see Druid's robes.

3rd age druidic robes are a set of 3rd age equipment. The robes require level 65 Prayer to wear. Players can obtain 3rd age druid robes equipment through master Treasure Trails; they cannot be bought in stores nor made through the Crafting skill.

Unlike its RuneScape counterpart, the 3rd age druidic wreath does not exist in Old School RuneScape. This is due to the druidic wreath, a reward from midsummer events, already existing.
